== Dependencies ==

on debian (on other distributions package names may vary)
  * cmake
  * libtbb-dev
  * liblzo2-dev
  * bmagic
  * mudflap can be used to debug (http://gcc.gnu.org/wiki/Mudflap_Pointer_Debugging) via -DWITH_MUDFLAP=1 at cmake time. Requires libmudflap0-XX-dev. *MUDFLAP_OPTIONS="-heur-proc-map"* can be used to avoid false positives (at least 4.3.4-6 gcc in debian)
  * libtut-dev for unittests

c++11 compiler with variadic-templates support required for TL interfaces (g++)
